amendment.description: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part D of House Report 117-366 to expand conservation activities eligible for funding under the Endangered Species Recovery and Habitat Conservation Legacy Fund to include efforts to manage, control, and prevent invasive species and disease.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kildee amendment (A004) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 231 - 189 (Roll no. 264).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A004) pursuant to the rule.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Kildee.
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Kildee amendment (A004) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 231 - 189 (Roll no. 264).
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Kildee amendment (A004) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 231 - 189 (Roll no. 264).
